Constructor inherits VRFConsumerBase
 Network: Kovan
 Chainlink VRF Coordinator address: 0xf490AC64087d59381faF8Bf49Da299C073aAC152
 LINK token address:                0xa36085F69e2889c224210F603D836748e7dC0088
 Key Hash: 0x6c3699283bda56ad74f6b855546325b68d482e983852a7a82979cc4807b641f4

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Not enough LINK - fill contract with faucet"

arguments.value: Not enough LINK - fill contract with faucet

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Not enough LINK - fill contract with faucet"

documentation.text: Requests randomness from a user-provided seed
Callback function used by VRF Coordinator
